selected_quotes: Great new take on the Ardnamurchan Viking boat burial co-written by our own Colleen Batey and alum
🆓RESEARCH article: Why was a #Viking laid to rest in a boat burial on #Ardnamurchan #Scotland? #Archaeology
So excited to see our Viking Boat Burial findings published
Dr Janet Montgomery is co-author on a paper on the Ardnamurchan Viking boat burial #IWD2017 #DUIWD17 @durham_uni

citation.title: Assembling places and persons: a tenth-century Viking boat burial from Swordle Bay on the Ardnamurchan peninsula, western Scotland

news.title: Mysterious Viking Ship Burial Yields a Trove of Artifacts
news.summary: A 1,000-year-old boat served as a burial for a high-status Viking. Credit: Ardnamurchan Transitions Project A boat which for 1,000 years served as the grave of a high status Viking has revealed some of its secrets, according to the first detailed…

news.title: Descubierto un barco funerario vikingo en Escocia
news.summary: A comienzos del siglo X d.C., un individuo vikingo, seguramente un hombre, fue enterrado dentro de un barco de madera y cerca de la costa, en la actual bahía de Swordle, en el oeste de Escocia.

news.title: Максим Руссо Погребальная ладья в Шотландии
news.summary: Группа археологов опубликовала в журнале Antiquity результаты исследования погребальной ладьи рубежа IX – X веков, раскопанной в 2011 году на полуострове Арднамерхан (Ardnamurchan) в Шотландии.

news.title: Harvinaisen viikinkihaudan miekkamies saattoikin olla nainen

news.title: 在船中長眠的武士：十世紀的維京船葬 - PanSci 泛科學
news.summary: 文／九爺｜本科學政治、Vor&Nach 史實歐洲武術會成員、戳樂黨員、業餘歷史與考古愛好者，興趣是講故事。 在 2011 年，一座保存完整且陪葬豐富的十世紀維京船葬遺址於蘇格蘭西部出土。墓葬本身混搭的風格激起了盜墓人，呃不，是考古學家們無盡的想像。 同位素分析顯示墓主很可能出身於斯堪地那維亞（Scandinavia），但陪葬品卻同時帶有蘇格蘭、愛爾蘭及北歐三地的風格。 陪葬的武器——劍與盾——顯示死者可能是一位上層階級的武士，而其他日用品——農具和廚具——則讓我們得以略窺其日常生活。 維京船葬：獨…

blogs.title: Researchers Wonder if Rich Viking Boat Burial Found in Scotland was Made for a Warrior Woman
blogs.summary: A team of researchers who have been examining the horde of grave goods left in an amazing Viking boat burial have decided that the deceased individual was definitely an important person in their society. While shedding light on the origins, diet, and socia

blogs.title: Viking boat burial found on British mainland
blogs.summary: Mainly found in Scandinavia, Viking boat burials are as rare as they are fascinating. The ones that have been archaeologically excavated in the UK were unearthed on the isles, like Orkney, Shetland and Man. The only boat burials found on mainland Britain w

author.name: The History Blog
author.description: History fetish? What history fetish?

blogs.title: Surprising Viking Boat Burial Found in Scotland
blogs.summary: Such ships have previously been unearthed across Scandinavia, but recently, archaeologists report the first discovery of a rich Viking boat burial on the UK mainland.

author.name: Mental Floss

facebook.title: Possible Viking boat grave found beneath Trondheim market square.
facebook.summary:
More #Vikings, or a Scandinavian #IronAge boat grave?

While we await confirmation, try the 2017 Antiquity journal article on the Ardnamurchan Viking boat burial in Scotland, which was the first complete example to be excavated on the British mainland!
